name: Timid Elephant
description:
Frog is late for a ship. An elephant is about to lift her but the way is full of insects, and the elephant is afraid of insects. But wait! The frog eats insects, so friends starts their journey.

Timid Elephant is a game about mutual aid, assistance and...FEAR!
Help the Elephant to pick his way through the jungle full of insects.
You have:

  • one-day journey through the jungle (from dawn to dusk);
  • 5 levels with different types of insects (from small mosquitoes to giant moths);
  • a GREAT fear of insects;
  • a business Frog who ISN'T afraid of insects and have a long tongue and a matter of great significance.

Eat insects, earn points and be the first in a highscore table!
